Title: Le moine
Writer: Luis Buñuel (screenplay), Jean-Claude Carrière (screenplay), Antonio Troiso (dialogue), Matthew Lewis (novel)
Actors: Franco Nero, Nathalie Delon, Nicol Williamson, Nadja Tiller
Plot: Ambrosio (Franco Nero) is a monk who is sexually tempted by an emissary of the Devil, a young girl in monk's robes. After he has committed numerous crimes, it appears that he will be caught...<a href="//m.imdb.com/title/tt0068960/plotsummary?ref_=m_tt_ov_pl">
